code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     // required for the sql component     getContext().getComponent("sql-stored", SqlStoredComponent.class).setDataSource(db).     from("direct:query").to("sql-stored:classpath:sql/selectStored.sql").to("mock:query"). }

@Override protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() throws Exception {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             // required for the sql component             getContext().getComponent("sql-stored", SqlStoredComponent.class).setDataSource(db).             from("direct:query").to("sql-stored:classpath:sql/selectStored.sql").to("mock:query").         }     }. }
